medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began 3 days ago without any precipitating events as an achy pain in the lower abdomen bilaterally. Two days ago, the pain was intermittently worse with spikes of intensity. It became more constant and localized to the left lower abdomen. Pain is alleviated when bending legs and exacerbated by walking and sudden movements.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Multiple Sclerosis (asymptomatic), Chronic iron deficiency anemia, Hospitalization for meningitis, Cholecystectomy, Cesarean section, Tonsillectomy
medical_history.family_history: Brother with pancreatic cancer at age unspecified, Daughter with diverticular disease
